†Célacanthes Agassiz 1844 Tome II pt. 2: 168 (family) †
Coelacanthus Agassiz
?1839 [latinized to †Caelacanthidae by Bonaparte 1846: 4 ; latinized to †Coelacanthoides by Giebel 1846: 65 , latinized to † Coelacanthi by M’Coy 1848: 2 , latinized to †Coelacanthoidei by Bleeker 1859 : XVII, latinized to † Coelacanthidae by Günther 1880: 365 ; considered valid with this authorship by Müller 1846: 151 , by Bronn 1849: 654 , by Quenstedt 1852: 228 , by Morris 1856: 315 , by Pander 1857: 42 , by
Andrews et al. 1967: 642
, by
Schultze et al. 1982: 46
, by Maisey 1991: 303 and by Lambers 1996: 396 Art. 11.7.2]
